code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import rootReducer from'./reducers';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import logger from'redux-logger';import rootSaga from'./sagas';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware,logger));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
